name: Project Unicorn - Running out of Space
name_original: Project Unicorn - Running out of Space
description:
You always wanted to be a brave dwarf riding a unicorn?

Then go ahead.
Jump with the "spacebar" and duck with "ctrl"
Escape from the devastating storm from the forest
and be careful that you do not use useless items while running
collect your inventory, you only have limited space.
Touch the wells to get rid of useless stuff.
Be careful not to fall into the ditches or get too slow.
Create new high scores and play alone or compete with your friends.
